summary: Just messed with colors and contrast
descriptionHtml:
Data>Textures>Armor>Glass>M


Haven\'t been able to test it so someone post a picture!


Came out pretty well, I didnt know how to spawn items at first so I wasnt exactly how sure how it looks but I like the finished product. Looks like elven armor with glass accents, might try to make them all more similar to the shoulder pads, maybe a darker green.
